Title: Merry Little Christmas
Plot: Wilson arranges for House to make a deal with Tritter, but House refuses. Meanwhile, Cuddy cuts House off Vicodin and removes him from the team's case: a 15-year-old little person who entered the hospital with a collapsed lung and anemia.
GuestStars: Cole Evan Weiss, Shyann McClure, Teddy Vincent, Michael Medico, Meredith Eaton-Gilden, Kacie Borrowman, David Morse
